title: Porn star offers to repay alleged Trump affair hush money
text:
Porn star offers to repay alleged Trump affair hush money 8:00pm GMT - 01:44 
The adult-film actress who says she had an affair with Donald Trump before he became U.S. president offered on Monday to give back the $130,000 that Trump’s personal lawyer paid her to keep mum about the alleged relationship. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
